name: @deeepvision/neskit-starter
description: NestKit Starter is a boilerplate project template that helps you quickly set up and start building NestJS applications with the power of NestKit.

scripts.docker:up: docker-compose -p nestkit-starter-db -f dev/docker-compose.yml pull && docker-compose -p nestkit-starter-db -f dev/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.restart:dev: npm run prebuild && npm run start:dev
scripts.migration:create: npm run typeorm -- migration:create src/migrations/CreateMigration || exit 0
scripts.migration:generate: npm run typeorm -- migration:generate -d src/datasource.ts src/migrations/BinaryFiles || exit 0
